price: ausgenommen die Sippe Luts. Diese werden Wir wahrlich allesamt erretten,
arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajmaʿīna
